commit_list.message:
Use jenkins::cli::exec in security.pp

Commit 6bc33de changed a whole bunch of `exec`s to `jenkins::cli::exec`
but missed this one out.

Without this change `exec` gets grumpy about the `command` argument
being an array.

commit_list.repo_description: funkbot2.0

commit_list.message:
Add TweetUrl plugin

This plugin matches for messages of the form

  <url> # <comment>

eg:

  http://www.kittenwar.com/ # kittens!

and posts them to the configured Twitter account along with
the author’s nick.

This allows Funkbot to use Twitter as an archive for interesting URLs.

The required Twitter API keys can be generated for an account at
https://apps.twitter.com/ by creating a dedicated app for the bot to
use.

commit_list.message:
Merge pull request #7 from pobox/report-localzone-zfs-usage

zfs: somewhat hacky support for local zone usage

triton-cn-resouces: return zero if no metrics are found

New compute nodes appear in CNAPI before they have any resource data
to provide. Just return zero in this case.

Merge pull request #5 from pobox/handle-zfs-logs-and-spares

Also handle `cache` in zpool status
Also handle cache in zpool status

Merge pull request #4 from pobox/handle-zfs-logs-and-spares

Handle logs and spares in zpool status

Handle logs and spares in zpool status

In `zpool status -v` output the 'logs' and 'spares' rows are
headers without read / write / checksum entries. Skip them.

Spares are listed as 'AVAIL', so don't consider that an error
state.

update runit::*

* not tested since no runit RPM yet
